description:
Mipple and Mepple get into a fight, and Nagisa and Honoka can’t seem to get them to make up with each other.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kowasugi! Dotsuku Zone Saigo no Kirifuda
L`Eroe Prescelto e la Principessa della Speranza
Too Scary! Dotsuku Zone`s Final Trump Card
ไพ่ใบสุดท้ายของดาร์คโซน น่ากลัวจริง
こわすぎ! ドツクゾーン最後の切り札
